text: Ra tiniharule allahako juna rupama adara garna jannu pardathyo, tyo janenan. Jaba tiniharule bhane ki allahale manisamathi kehi pani utareko chaina. Bhannus ki juna kitaba musale li'era a'eka thi'e, tyasala'i kasale pradana gareko cha, yasako visesata ho ki yo manisaharuko nimti prakasa ra margadarsana ho ra jasala'i timiharule alagaâ€“alaga panama rakhirakheka chau, tyasaka kehi bhagala'i ta prakata gardachau ra dheraila'i luka'umchau. Timiharula'i ti dherai kuraharu sika'iyo jasala'i ki na timi jandathyau ra na ta timra thulabadale. Bhanidinus ki (yasa kitabala'i) allahale nai utareko cha yasartha tiniharula'i unako tuccha kuraharuko bakvasama khelirakhna dinus
